description:
Course on Accounting for Depreciation will enable the learners to understand the importance of Depreciation, How it is calculated, its uses, various methods of depreciation. Depreciation is one of the key element in determining the profits and dividends available for the share holders. In this course, we have used various practical problems ranging from basics to advanced to understand the depreciation concepts.

Materials used in this course

Video Lectures, Practical Illustrations are used in this course.

Course Structure

This course is structured in Self Paced Style. Learners can learn at their comfort.

Why to take this course?

Take this course to understand the importance of Depreciation Accounting.
title: Accounting for Depreciation (Collage Level)
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
